thread.section_title: Excelsior Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Love this hotel
thread.title_full: Love this hotel - Review of Excelsior Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Louisetc
title: Love this hotel
text: On both visits to New York with my family we have stayed here and I love it! The hotel is lovely the reception staff are always welcoming and friendly. The rooms are well kept and cosy. Although it's a slight walk in to the centre its right next to central park and has some lovely restaurants near by. We love it here and no doubt we will be back.
